#summary Irc server basic setup for ircivelaclient


 * Install package ircd-irc2 (The original IRCNet IRC server daemon)
 * Edit /etc/ircd/ircd.conf:
    * Change <serverhostname> <ipaddress> <name_of_your_ircserver> by your server settings:

         {{{
M:irc.<serverhostname>:<ipaddress>:<name_of_your_ircserver>::6667

# A-Line
A:This is Debian's default ircd configurations:Please edit your /etc/ircd/ircd.conf file:Contact <root@localhost> for questions::ExampleNet

# Y-Lines
Y:1:90::100:512000:5.5:100.100
Y:2:90::300:512000:5.5:250.250

# I-Line
I:*:::0:1
I:127.0.0.1/32:::0:1

# P-Line
P::::6667:

}}}
